type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Riptide Override

---

Allows using the riptide enchantment without having the enchantment, with a configurable durability cost.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "moborigins:riptide_override",
  "trident_damage": 10,
  "condition": {
    "type": "origins:daytime",
    "inverted": true
  }
}
```
This allows using the riptide enchantment without having the enchantment, only during the night, at the cost of 10 durability.

trident_damage.description: The amount of durability to take from the trident when using the riptide enchantment.
